thread.title: Ranbir, Deepika’s soulful track `Agar tum saath ho` released
thread.title_full: Ranbir, Deepika’s soulful track `Agar tum saath ho` released

author: NewsWire
title: Ranbir, Deepika’s soulful track `Agar tum saath ho` released
text:
0 0 0 0 0 
New Delhi, Oct 24 (ANI): Ranbir Kapoor and Deepika Padukone’s most-awaited movie of this year ‘Tamasha’s another song ‘Agar tum saath ho’ has been released and is making people fall in love with duo’s terrific chemistry. 
One can see Deepika in her character Tara, expressing her deep-love and crying her heart out for Ved Vardhan, played by Ranbir, in the recently-released music video of their heart-warming song. 
In this clip, Deepika can be seen clutching Ranbir in her arms. It appears that the song will come at a point in the film when Tara realizes that she can’t live without Ved. 
It is sung by Alka Yagnik and Arijit Singh and is the third song from the movie and after ‘Matargashti’ and ‘Heer Toh Badi Sad’. 
The movie is set to hit theatres on November 27. (ANI) Related Posts
